About Me

A few things about me

Bio

I am a self taught frontend developer with a solid set of skills. I know that at the moment I can offer all the basic knowledge about frontend development in making websites and web apps, but i seek to improve my skills and never stop growing them. I'm a hardworking person who is willing to put in the work and ready to learn!

Past tech related work experiences

Data-Drill - Junior Frontend Developer | started working in February 2021

A small new company working with web crawlers mostly. Worked with Vue.js framework on the frontend for a french client. Refactored the Prismaccess search platform frontend code using Vue.js . Learned a lot about responsive design and working on a team and for a client. Meeting the demands of the client for the timeline set.
